view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"latestStoredBlockNumber","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"latestStoredHash","outputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"","type":"bytes32"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"name":"predictions","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"predictor","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"targetBlock","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"predictedHash","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"actualHash","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"bool","name":"revealed","type":"bool"},{"internalType":"bool","name":"correct","type":"bool"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"timestamp","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_predictionId","type":"uint256"}],"name":"revealPrediction","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"_predictedHash","type":"bytes32"}],"name":"submitPrediction","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"predictionId","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"totalPredictions","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"name":"userPredictions","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"kind":"dev","methods":{"submitPrediction(bytes32)":{"params":{"_predictedHash":"The hash you think the next block will have.                        Pass bytes32(0) to use one of the preset options                        generated off-chain."}}},"title":"BlockHashPredictor","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"currentBlockNumber()":{"notice":"Return the current block number (convenience for front-end)"},"getBlockHash(uint256)":{"notice":"Return the hash of a recent block (within 256 blocks)"},"getPrediction(uint256)":{"notice":"Get full prediction details"},"getUserPredictions(address)":{"notice":"All prediction IDs for a given user"},"revealPrediction(uint256)":{"notice":"Reveal the actual hash for a prior prediction.         Can be called by anyone once the target block is mined         (and within 256 blocks \u2013 EVM limitation)."},"submitPrediction(bytes32)":{"notice":"Submit a prediction for the NEXT block's hash."},"totalPredictions()":{"notice":"Total number of predictions stored"}},"notice":"Users predict the next block's hash. Predictions are stored on-chain         and can be verified once the target block is mined.","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/BlockHashPredictor.sol":"BlockHashPredictor"},"evmVersion":"paris","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"contracts/BlockHashPredictor.sol":{"keccak256":"0x24765c4aea8945ecd990a4fa814b5a2a7d926ef75fb56478a383a951c4898417","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://9b351ac6ab1af0167228099f5fba4fe57328f9bbc5f0113b3a85d2a26c731a55","dweb:/ipfs/QmNgJ7KzFKiPQyk12Xd3JaFndXjXW3uDdKj8iK3UsPbpLB"]}},"version":1}
